name: ElectroScope
description: ElectroScope is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, cat buttons, classic arms and legs, and a striking red and black screen, ElectroScope stands out in any crowd. It boasts impressive ability scores in hp, charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom. This robot is not just a visual delight but also a powerful companion for any technological endeavor.
